author: costin
msg: Start to add version info and deprecation and to clean up the method names.
Only few of the new methods will be "public" - a lot of stuff should be
considered experimental until it gets more review and use.
I also added a mechanism to support per/context class loader instantiation -
this will be important if modeler moves to the parent loader and we want
to support multiple versions of a component ( or to improve security )
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'TOMCAT_5_0_1'.

author: costin
